__e: One morning poncing around without your guilt chip and suddenly you think you're some hoity-toity robo-god instead of the lashed-together Meccano gimboid that you are.
I looked at her sleeping face Deep dawn inside of me, every sensation suddenly died... wand I recalled what I had been for the last 4 years, until this day
The dog barks at night and suddenly you've got a 200-pound wolf at the door!
Suddenly I realised, that the owner was you.
I have lots of aspirations, I'm used to going where I want.
All of a sudden, I have to make a change.
We just tried to keep behind him, and all of a sudden he lost control.

That day is coming. It is inevitable. “The day of the Lord will come as a thief in the night.” You don’t expect a thief to come. But suddenly he does – without warning! And that is the way judgment will come. People will not be prepared! The vast majority will not be ready! “The day of the Lord will come as a thief in the night.”
Well, it all happened very suddenly one night.
What do you do when you suddenly see a snake in your house?
He has often left as suddenly and without warning.
You went away suddenly and come back suddenly again?
I see a love ending here... another beginning suddenly that drives you crazy.
